Fanúšikovia obľúbenej šou sa znovu môžu tešiť na staronové prostredie Považského Inovca, v ktorom sa natáčala 13. séria Farmy, nekompromisnú Alicu, nový typ farmárčenia spojený s množstvo noviniek a výrazne zmenené pravidlá, ktoré prekvapia nejedného farmára. Opäť nebudú chýbať ani napínavé duely či jednotlivé epizódy, v ktorých sa bude striedať smiech, slzy, vtipné i dramatické situácie, a tak ako vždy budú plné nečakaných zvratov. Šou bude divákov aj tento rok sprevádzať obľúbený herec Marek Fašiang a chýbať nebude ani ostrieľaný hospodár Martin Bagar.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Výpomoc: Denisa je atraktívna a ambiciózna moderátorka, ktorá miluje svoju prácu. A je úspešná, vedenie televízie jej dokonca ponúkne zaujímavú pracovnú ponuku. Denisa ju s radosťou prijme, no začína mať zdravotné ťažkosti. Vyhľadá lekára, ktorý jej oznamuje, že je tehotná. Manžel Adam sa poteší, no Denisa nevie či materské povinnosti a vysnívanú prácu dokáže zvládnuť...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Viktor sa dozvie, že Michal porušil sľub a povedal Paule o pôžičke. Ján si na golfe s Vladom začne uvedomovať, že Vladio je vešké zviera. Paula bude stáť pred ťažkým rozhodnutím, či prijať veľkú zákazku aj s rizikom, že ju nebudú schopní zvládnuť.

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Televízia Markíza prináša na obrazovky neuveriteľnú pätnástu sériu obľúbenej reality šou Farma. Tentokrát to na statku bude o „súboji generácií“, kedy o atraktívnu finančnú výhru zabojuje 15 farmárov, rozdelených do troch skupín podľa generácie. Každá sa narodila v inom období a práve Farma ukáže, ktorá generácia na statku uspeje – bude to skupina X, narodená pred rokom 1989, skupina Y – deti 90-tych rokov alebo najmladšia generácia Z, narodená po roku 2000? Fanúšikovia obľúbenej šou sa znovu môžu tešiť na staronové prostredie Považského Inovca, v ktorom sa natáčala 13. séria Farmy, nekompromisnú Alicu, nový typ farmárčenia spojený s množstvo noviniek a výrazne zmenené pravidlá, ktoré prekvapia nejedného farmára. Opäť nebudú chýbať ani napínavé duely či jednotlivé epizódy, v ktorých sa bude striedať smiech, slzy, vtipné i dramatické situácie, a tak ako vždy budú plné nečakaných zvratov. Šou bude divákov aj tento rok sprevádzať obľúbený herec Marek Fašiang a chýbať nebude ani ostrieľaný hospodár Martin Bagar.

programme.title: Love Island III
programme.sub-title: Hľadanie lásky v raji v novej sérii obľúbenej romantickej šou
programme.desc: Slniečko, odhalené telá, morský vzduch a dovolenková atmosféra. Na obrazovky TV Markíza sa vracia Love Island, horúca reality šou plná zábavy, slnka, romantiky a hľadania lásky v známej vile na španielskom ostrove Gran Canaria. Šesť párov vzniknutých počas prvej a druhej série obľúbenej reality šou je spolu dodnes a vytvoriť zamilovaný pár sa pokúsia aj súčasní „singles“ zo Slovenska a Česka, obyvatelia vily tretej série. Budú si nielen užívať krásne počasie a zábavné hry, ale pod dohľadom televíznych kamier budú hľadať lásku svojho života. Diváčky a diváci v „priamom prenose“ uvidia, ako sa mladí ľudia nechávajú opantať láskou, so všetkými vzostupmi a pádmi, so všetkými emóciami, ktoré tento najkrajší cit so sebou prináša. Vzniknuté páry prejdú testom pevnosti svojich vzťahov, pretože každému, kto nebude v páre alebo bude spárovaný účelovo, bude hroziť, že bude musieť šou opustiť. Víťazná dvojica získa rozprávkových 75 000 eur. Zamilované „srdiečka“ prevedie pobytom na ostrove lásky opäť hviezdna moderátorka Zorka Hejdová.

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Adela show
programme.sub-title: Talkshow Adely Banášovej
programme.desc: Talkshow Adely Banášovej

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Profesionálnu svokru Gizku Oňovu si zavolala na pomoc 29-ročná Viera, ktorá žije vo Veľkom Krtíši s 24-ročným manželom Lukášom a svojimi dvoma synmi, 8-ročným Jakubkom a 3-ročným Lukáškom. Viera si už tri roky nevie dať rady s problémami, ktoré sužujú jej rodinu. Jej manžel Lukáš si totiž nevie nájsť cestu k jej staršiemu synovi Jakubkovi, ktorý bol výsledkom mladíckej nerozvážnosti s exotickým partnerom zo zahraničia. Viere prekáža, ako sa k nemu Lukáš správa, stále na neho len kričí a na rozdiel od ich spoločného syna Lukáška sa mu takmer vôbec nevenuje. Následkom toho medzi nimi vznikajú vážne partnerské hádky a Viera je už z celej situácie zúfalá. Dúfa, že skúsená Gizka odhalí, čo robia zle, kde nastala chyba, a dokáže ich rodinu zachrániť...

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Hviezda: Renáta má niečo po tridsiatke a od posledného rozchodu je dlhšie sama. V domácnosti žije len s matkou, ktorá sa jej občas snaží niekoho dohodiť. Najnovšie muža v jej veku, ktorý sa do susedného domu nasťahoval po zosnulej starkej. A nie je to vraj hocikto...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Gymnastka: Jana je bývalá úspešná gymnastka, momentálne pracuje ako trénerka. S otcom Dominikom vychováva päťnásťročnú dcéru Lauru, z ktorej chce mať špičkovú tenistku. Tá však inklinuje skôr k tenisu. Napätie v rodine sa prehĺbi po istej nečakanej udalosti...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Deň matiek. Komediálny seriál SR (2007).
programme.desc: Ildikó musí odísť na služobnú cestu a ťažko sa jej lúči s Lászlom. František dostane za úlohu postrážiť mamu Ildikó, ktorá je popletená a hovorí jedine po maďarsky. Zuzana čelí komplimentom svojho šéfa, ktorý jej pod rúškom kariérneho postupu dáva neslušné návrhy.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Dieťa. Komediálny seriál SR (2007).
programme.desc: László je celý nesvoj, že Ildikó so Zuzanou sa chystajú na dámsku jazdu., chcú si na víkend vyraziť. František sa teší na chvíle slobody a pripravuje typický chlapský program - veľa piva, filmy na dvd a pukance pri televízore. Ich plány skríži suseda Marta, ktorá ma na starosti kamarátkino dieťa.

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Televízna svokra Gizka Oňová prichádza na pomoc do Veľkého Krtíša, oslovil ju list od Ľubice, tá sa už nedokáže prizerať krutému osudu detí jej kamarátky Vierky, ktorá pred štyrmi mesiacmi zomrela na rakovinu. Viera po sebe zanechala 21-ročnú Martinu a 15-ročného Lukáša, pričom Martina má už aj svoju vlastnú 3-ročnú dcérku Natálku s priateľom, ktorý ju následne nechal. Ich otec Vojtech pracuje v Česku a vôbec sa o nich nestará, aj vplyvom alkoholu mali s Vierou časté fyzické konflikty, ktoré vyústili do rozvodu. Martina si po Vierinej smrti vzala Lukáša do opatery, je však nezamestnaná a nedostáva takmer žiadnu finančnú podporu, následkom čoho prišli o bývanie a skončili v podnájme, ktorý však tiež finančne neutiahnu. Ocitli sa doslova v beznádejnej situácii, jednou nohou na ulici a bez reálnej šance si niečo vybaviť, Gizkina pomoc je preto bytostne dôležitá...

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Sieť: Pani Lujze pred pár mesiacmi zomrel manžel. Syn Milan s manželkou sa ju snažia nejako rozptýliť, preto sa rozhodnú, že tam nechajú na prázdniny jedenásťročného Alexa. Ten podľa rodičov začína byť od počítačových hier závislý, preto sa nazdávajú, že pobyt na dedine bez internetu mu pomôže. S internetovou závislosťou však začína mať problém niekto iný...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Vladovi sa podarí votrieť do Jánovej priazne a pozvať sa k Pollnerovcom na večeru. Noru neodradí ani to, že prichytila Romana s Miou a vyzná mu lásku. Michal neverí, že sa Viktor dokáže vyhnúť problémom a rozhodne sa situáciu zobrať do vlastných rúk.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Na nože II
programme.sub-title: Reality show SR (2023)
programme.desc: Piti-Piti-Pá: Martin Novák po prvý raz takmer odíde v polovici slávnostnej večere po tom, ako majiteľ reštaurácie ignoruje jeho návrhy a robí všetko pre to, aby Martinov nový koncept nefungoval. Dotiahne šéfkuchár svoju dnešnú misiu do úspešného konca? Jarný divácky hit Na nože pokračuje na jeseň 2023 ďalšími premiérovými časťami. V čisto slovenskej verzii formátu Kitchen Nightmares si srdcia divákov okamžite získal renomovaný a viacerými prestížnymi oceneniami ovenčený šéfkuchár Martin Novák, ktorý podával pomocnú ruku problémovým a krachujúcim reštauráciám. Nekládol si pri tom servítku pred ústa a často bol aj poriadne prísnym kritikom. Nie vždy sa však jeho snaha pomôcť stretla s pochopením a častokrát to boli práve majitelia reštaurácií, ktorí v podniku držali zatiahnutú ručnú brzdu. V druhej sérii Martin znova navštívi vybrané gastronomické prevádzky po celom Slovensku a za prítomnosti televíznych kamier sa pokúsi vytiahnuť z problémov tie, ktoré sa z najrôznejších dôvodov ocitli v kríze, alebo dokonca na hranici krachu. Po nejakom čase každú reštauráciu prekvapí svojou návštevou, aby preveril, či naozaj došlo k zlepšeniu a reštaurácii odovzdá nálepku s hodnotením. Na nože je formát plný emócií, pri ktorého sledovaní sa diváci TV Markíza ani túto jeseň rozhodne nebudú nudiť!

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Tribunál: Štyridsiatnik Michal je atraktívnym mužom, úspešným architektom. Doteraz žil bujarým životom, o partnerky nikdy nemal núdzu. Jedného dňa však stretne obyčajnú Lindu a osudovo sa do nej zamiluje. Jeho počínanie sa stretne s nepochopením zo strany rodičov, ktorí Lindu odmietnu prijať. Dokonca naňho začnú vyvíjať nátlak, aby sa s ňou rozišiel...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Nora sa po rozchode s Romanom psychicky zrúti a oporu jej ponúkne práve Paula. Viktor príjme Michalove peniaze ako pôžičku a rozhodne sa ich investovať do založenia vlastnej cestovnej agentúry. Zdesená Oľga požiada Vlada aby ju netýral a pomstil sa jej rýchlo.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Návrat Bobíka: László privedie domov opäť Haberovho psa Bobíka. Ildikó si myslí, že jej ho kúpil, ale má ho iba 3 dni postrážiť. Problémom však je, že fakticky musí o stráženie poprosiť Františka, lebo Ildi ide do školy, on sám ide s Gergejom na vyšetrenie k urológovi a doma sú hluční majstri, ktorí vymieňajú kuchynský drez. František vyčíta Zuzane nákup predražených zubných pást, ktoré sú príčinou, že budú musieť zrušiť plánovanú dovolenku na jachte v Chorvátsku. Zuzana sa vyhovára, že za všetko môže pes, ktorý jej urobil prvú škodu už na "luxusnom spodnom prádle". László pochopí, že v tejto domácnosti mu Bobíka nepostrážia. Navyše Marta by rada využila Františkov byt na nácvik divadelnej postavy z Gogoľovho revízora. Na Lesnej správe je teda László v práci aj so psom. Tvrdí, že je na výcviku za poľovníckeho. Žiaľ pes, ktorý sa ľaká hvízdania sokola, by ťažko obstál v tomto obore. František, ktorý by potreboval výdatne zrelaxovať, si nevie nájsť pokojné miesto. V jeho bývalej kancelárii bude ešte týždeň sedieť Ing. Brhlík, kým mu vyprší výpovedná lehota. Doma, ho prepadne Marta s celým divadelným ansámblom, a kým je László u urológa, tak nakoniec stráži aj psa, ktorý sa zľakne Martinho smiechu. František nenájde pokoj ani v byte u Lászlóa, lebo majstri ešte nedokončili výmenu drezu a u Milky nachytá párik, ktorý usilovne pracuje na jeho ďalšom vnúčati. Podarí sa Lászlóovi nájsť vyľakaného Bobíka, keď ho neplánovane musí vrátiť ešte v tej istý deň majiteľovi? Všimne si Zuzana doma rozbité okno aj obľúbenú vázu? Ako dopadne László, pri pokuse "jemne" zmanipulovať vrátenie psa? Nájde František konečne kľud aspoň v kutici pod schodami? A ako mu pomôže upratovačka, pani Katka?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Dovolenka: František so Zuzanou stále tvrdia, že idú na dovolenku na luxusnú jachtu, László s Ildilkó zas na veľtrh klobás do 5-hviezdičkového hotela v Debrecíne. Čo bude robiť vo Františkovom byte počas ich neprítomnosti Františkova mamička? Prečo v oboch bytoch pristihne Milku s Gergejom v chúlostivých situáciách? Spoločnú bytovku Susedov navštívia nefalšovaní šmejdi, v Marte a mamičke však nájdu dôstojných protivníkov. Podarí sa Martin plán, aby sa najlepší kamaráti, ktorí tentoraz nešli na dovolenku spoločne, stretli na polceste medzi Debrecínom a chorvátskym pobrežím? A prečo Ildikó aj Zuzana podozrievajú svojich manželov z nevery? A čoho bude dôkazom fotka z policajného radaru v Bešeňovej?

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Televízia Markíza prináša na obrazovky neuveriteľnú pätnástu sériu obľúbenej reality šou Farma. programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Ozveny minulosti: Veronika a Dušan Kolárovci žijú spolu už šestnásť rokov. Aj napriek tomu, že nemôžu mať deti, sú spolu šťastní. V ostatnom čase sa Dušan začne správať čudne. Veroniku niekoľkokrát oklamal. Tá zisťuje, že je za tým šestnásťročná Hanka, ktorú Veronika nachádza priviazanú k radiátoru. Hanka tvrdí, že jej Dušan dával drogy a že ju znásilňoval. On však tvrdí, že je nevinný...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Sieť: Pani Lujze pred pár mesiacmi zomrel manžel. Syn Milan s manželkou sa ju snažia nejako rozptýliť, preto sa rozhodnú, že tam nechajú na prázdniny jedenásťročného Alexa. programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands (3)

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Home Movie. Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece –featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Fish Sitting. Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wicket’s pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbour’s house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Cruise. Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes ‘man overboard’ and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Coconut Shy. Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesn’t have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises it’s a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesn’t go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Toad & Friends

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Kindness. The bugs talk about ways to show kindness.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Tuffy Love. Jerry and Tuffy are getting ready to go to a family reunion and they're mailing themselves off! Unfortunately Tuffy gets left behind. Although Tom Thinks Tuffy is easy pickings he's in for a surprise as Tuffy makes his life really difficult. Jerry races back home when he realizes he left Tuffy behind.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Poof. Tom and Jerry are hired by a bad magician to find out where his pigeon friend disappeared during a magic trick gone wrong. Their investigation leads them to discover the pigeon. Unfortunately he really believes his friend has magic powers and is waiting for magic to bring him back. At the end of the day it's the power of friendship that solves this case.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Kindness. The bugs talk about ways to show kindness.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Top Cat. When Tom and Butch compete for the Golden Fez and a chance to be top cat in the United Mouse Catchers they must prove their worth by finally catching Jerry. Butch finds out that Jerry is a tough opponent and also finds that living with Spike and Tyke is no piece of cake.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Mummy Dearest. Hildie and Beatie commemorate the passing of their Mother and Tom tries to help out by bringing her back from the grave. She is so evil that the witches command Tom to make a spell to send her back. Tom and Jerry must find a way to send her back and must outwit the Mom's evil spellbook bent on keeping her here.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Things We Love. The bugs talk about what they love.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Hotel Bean. A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Jurassic Bean. Mr Bean is on a photography jaunt in the countryside snapping the normal everyday wildlife – a fox a bird a dinosaur! A DINOSAUR?!! Mr Bean is terrified until he realises what fame and fortune it could bring him. Does he get the photograph of a lifetime or is the situation not quite as it seems?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Caring Bean. Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Opera Bean. Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: No Contest. After entering Tyke in an agility contest, Spike sets up a course for the puppy in the backyard. Soon, Spike decides the course isn't hard enough and gets Tom to help, bending Tom into pretzel-like positions for Tyke to leap over, through, or into. After all this preparation, Tyke must still make it to the competition on time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Calorie Count. Jerry's high-born cousin Count DaCalories—a haughty city mouse—visits the estate. At first, he acts sleek and refined, but soon he can't resist pigging out and going on multiple kitchen raids. As his paunch grows, it becomes more and more difficult for him to outrun Tom and stay out of sight of the Duchess's visitor.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Fortune Hunters. When Stinker, the trash-loving dog, comes by looking for help, Tom and Jerry aren't inclined to take the case until they hear it involves a missing fortune. So, they're disappointed when they find out Stinker is searching for a lost fortune cookie from his Chinese takeout to learn his fate. Retracing the dog's steps, they chase the fortune cookie's trail through town.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Game Changer. As Jerry and Tuffy play marbles, Tom throws a soccer ball in their direction and upsets the game. This sparks a chase between Tom and Jerry, and Jerry takes cover in a room that looks like a giant chessboard. As more chess pieces show up, Tom and Jerry attempt their best to outplay them.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Kiss and Makeup. Tom is chasing the mice around the haunted house when midnight strikes, and he finds himself face-to-face with a green-faced beast who's just as surprised to encounter Tom. It's soon revealed to be Toodles, who's a good witch brewing magic beauty products. Although Tom is enchanted at first, things stop going smoothly when he helps with her potions.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Suitable for Framing. A ghost paints a flattering portrait of Tom, but Tom is stingy with his payment and the ghost casts a spell on the portrait. Strange things start happening as the portrait absorbs injuries and calories that should be affecting Tom. However, soon Jerry and Tuffy figure out what's going on and use it to their advantage.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Lift. Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Dig This. Mr Bean attempts to build a shady gazebo in the back garden on a scorching hot day. But as he digs into the ground he unearths a huge unexploded bomb. Trying to make Mrs Wicket aware of the danger and save Scrapper and Teddy from being blown to smithereens takes courage nerve and a Bean styled homemade bomb disposal kit.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Bean Hypnotised. Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Car Wash. Mr Bean's car is filthy so he gives it a good wash. His sparklingly clean car attracts the attention of other drivers who offer to pay Mr Bean to wash their cars too. Bean cannot resist and builds a car-washing contraption to help him out. But when a certain very posh visitor’s car gets damaged Bean thinks he’s for the chop.

programme.desc: James and the Dragon

No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Wired. Alice decides to accompany Lewis on his trip to deliver vitamins to the Rainbow. It’s a pretty risky operation, involving climbing a very long wire, but Lewis is fearless thanks to his “balance button.” However, when he drops the button halfway, it’s panic all round! In the end, thanks to Alice, Lewis realizes that in order to accomplish his mission, he doesn’t need to recover his “balance button” after all - he merely needs to restore his self-confidence!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Lost Crown. After skidding out of control, the Queen loses her crown a little too long for comfort: as per the official rules, this deprives her de facto of her royal powers. At least now the tables can be turned: she can step into the shoes of her subjects, for once, and find out what it’s like to be a commoner. Or at least that’s what Alice is planning: unbeknownst to Lewis, she has hidden the precious crown on purpose: this little life lesson will do the Queen the world of good!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hoverboard. Mike is impressed with Tom's hoverboard tricks and decides to try to master them to impress Iris. As soon as Tom steps out, Mike tries to get his hands on the board but the turtles have other ideas. In fact, everyone seems to want a turn on the hoverboard, including the raccoons. It's the perfect way for them to get their loot from the house to their den. Mike is going to have to step up if he wants to defeat the raccoons and get Tom's hoverboard back.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hypnosis. Mike wakes up in the bathtub, huh? The house has been turned upside down and the other animals are being weird. They're acting like zombies and carrying food out of the house. Our pug discovers that the raccoons have hypnotised Fluffy, the turtles, and Iris, and are using them to transport the contents of the Mikkelsens fridge to their lair. Our hero will need to confront Iris to save her from the raccoon's dastardly scheme... and refill the Mikkelson's fridge!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike Flu. Poor Mike is bedridden. He's been struck down by a nasty cold so Iris and the turtles are forced take care of his every need, including trying to repel the raccoons from the house. Fighting raccoons isn't their specialty and Iris and the turtles quickly end up locked in the garage. Mike is forced to intervene but he's so sick and weak that he's a pushover. How can he overcome the raccoons this time? Mike's problem could be the very solution he needs to defeat the tenacious raccoons.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: In The Doghouse. Mike is forced to spend the day outside in his doghouse due to Grandma Mikkelsen's fur allergy. Mike makes the best of being exiled and plans to spruce the place up and invite Iris over for an outdoor picnic. But Mercury has been kicked out of his lair after a fight with his brother and decides to squat in the doghouse. Mike does everything he can to wake up the snoozing raccoon and get him out of his home. It looks like he's going to have to bring in the big guns if has any chance of evicting his unwanted guest before Iris shows up.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: CoComelon

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Green Bean. Mr Bean’s electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Bean’s flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Bean’s wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Cash Machine. Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesn’t have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he can’t remember his pin number. When Mr Bean's bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine there’s only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Bean’s main concern is to get some money and get back to the baker’s before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Litterbug. Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own ‘No Littering’ signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Rat Trap. Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories don’t always have happy endings.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Molecular Breakup. Dr. Bigby invents a transporting machine that accidentally transports Jerry and Tom to Paris where they meet Gigi and Cozette. They fall in love but are transported back. Bot and Napoleon break the machine trying to get them back and then they have to figure out how to make the machine work again. Bot falls in love with a robot named Dee and tries to fix her.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Trying. The bugs talk about trying new things.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Just Plane Nuts. Rick and Ginger are going on a vacation and bringing Tom and Spike aboard the plane. Stowaways Jerry and Tuffy are also along for the ride and things go awry when all the pets start chasing each other on the plane. Rick and Ginger are oblivious that their pets are annoying the entire plane.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Pets Not Welcome. When Rick and Ginger sneak Tom and Spike into a hotel where pets are not allowed they make the pets promise they won't leave the hotel room! Too bad Jerry and Tuffy want to explore and have fun. The pets run rampant through the hotel while being chased by the hotel manager. They manage to trash the hotel and get kicked out of their paradise vacation.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Sadness. The bugs talk about feeling sad.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Taxi Bean. Mr Bean takes a taxi to his local toyshop but a dodgy cabbie thinks he can take Mr Bean for a ride. After a mix up Mr Bean finds himself driving the taxi and starts to have fun couriering people to their destinations even giving an American tourist an extensive tour of London. But will the taxi driver find out what’s been going on and how much will Bean’s final fare be?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Muscle Bean. Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A New Friend. Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Lift. Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Springtime for Spike. When Rick and Ginger are asked to dog-sit for a friend's French poodle, Sabrina, Tom is initially on his guard, but soon he's practically eating out of her hand. Next, Spike falls for Sabrina and does everything he can to impress her with how kind he is to Tom. How long will everyone's behavior be affected by Sabrina's presence?

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Knighty Knight Knight. Tom, Jerry and Tuffy have a run-in with a moving suit of armor. The knight scares Tom away, but Jerry makes a brave stand because he thinks the knight is Tom in disguise. Jerry eventually trips the suit of armor and finds out it's inhabited by three kittens. Relieved at first, the pets soon realize that battling one haunted knight is nothing compared to battling three real-life kittens.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Phan-Tom of the Oompah. In Catsylvania, the peasant mice oompah band plays onstage at the auditorium. As the bandleader's lovely daughter, Gretta, hits a high note in her rousing song, Tom—in a mask and hood—swings in on a rope and abducts her. Van Mouseling and the peasant band chase him through the rafters and backstage, but Tom escapes with his captive to a subterranean lair. Will the mice manage to free Gretta?

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Ballad of the Catnip Kid. After Tom drifts off to sleep, a tumbleweed blows into his face, and he discovers that the kitchen looks like an old west saloon. The bartender, Spike, and customers recognize him as the Catnip Kid. Then he sees himself in the mirror—dressed like a gunslinger, a silver-plated pea shooter holstered to his hip! Will Sherriff Jerry bring him to justice in this western adventure?

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Mirror Image. Skullie tells Tom that he won't have to sweat a visit from one of the spooks tonight. However, Tom is soon drawn to a full-length mirror that causes no shortage of trouble. As he gets pulled into the mirror, an evil reflection cat trades places with him. Tuffy and Jerry enter the mirror world too and must fight their reflection selves for survival.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Gym Rat. Overweight Jerry starts working out on a weight machine supplied to him by cousin Muscles. Not to be outdone, Tom starts lifting weights as well – which sets up an epic Battle Royale between the cat and mouse.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.sub-title: The Box. Lu and Barnaby can't agree on how to play with a cardboard box.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Spotty Rocket. Gus gets upset when he can't finish his rocket the way he'd planned.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.sub-title: Baby Shark V3 (Submarine Version)

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Where Did You... Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wicket’s flat but her sideboard tumbles over and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realizing that it’s only his landlady’s furry hat Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vets in a desperate attempt to save his feline friend’s life.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Valuable Lessons. Mr Bean helps Mrs Wicket collect up all her money together after she witnesses a robbery. With all her cash safely locked in a bank vault Mrs Wicket suddenly finds she has a new admirer but Mr Bean doesn’t trust this smooth operator one bit. With wedding bells ringing Mr Bean races against time to solve the mystery and save Mrs Wicket…and her money.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Halloween. Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Bean Painting. Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: DOROTHY AND THE WIZARD OF OZ is an animated comedy fantasy series that transports viewers back to the wonderful land of Oz. Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale (GREY DeLISLE) has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Ditzy Home. Stephan upgrades the house's security system and it looks like Mike might be able to take a break from playing guard dog. The new system immediately detects when the raccoons are trying to break in and ejects from the property. Mike didn't even have to lift a paw. Unfortunately, the system works a little too well and quickly targets Mike as an intruder too. Now Mike and Freddy are on the same team trying to break in so he can defeat the errant security system and save Mercury and Fluffy who are still trapped inside.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A Royal Make-over. How does one choose tasteful wallpaper these days? After watching a royal documentary on TV, Mr. Bean decides to decorate his room in the style of Buckingham Palace. If the Queen’s new wallpaper is good enough for Her Royal Highness, then it’s going to be good enough for him. Meanwhile, his landlady, Mrs. Wicket, suffers from illusions of grandeur and crowns herself Queen of the street.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: SuperMarrow. Mr. Bean finds himself in a race to grow a giant marrow with his next-door neighbour. There’s prize money at stake and a chance to get his photo in the papers. And so, as the competition gets tough, Bean’s gardening techniques become more ingenious, unconventional and desperate.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Bean in Love. He’s got her record, the poster and the T-shirt, so when Mr. Bean’s heart-throb, Roxy, is set to sing in concert at the London Palladium, he sets his sights on the only thing that will make his life complete: her signature in his autograph book. A difficult feat but can love prevail?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Double Trouble. Mr. Bean is over the moon when he meets Mr. Pod because both men have so much in common; same shirt, jacket, trousers and underpants. And to top it all, Pod is Bean’s spitting image! Bean falls to Earth with a bump, though, when his girlfriend, Irma Gobb, finds Mr. Pod much better looking than him.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.sub-title: I’ll Be Your Shelter. A musical tribute to Ace, the super-brave bat-hound!
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Dinner Is Swerved. When Rick and Ginger leave Tom home alone Tom and Jerry decide to invite their lady friends Toodles and Toots over for a romantic dinner. Things don't go as planned when they all start to get in each others' way. Food fights and tempers rise when dinner goes haywire.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Bottled Up Emotions. Dr. Bigby works on creating a formula for a love potion which accidentally gets on Jerry when Napoleon tries to use it against Tom. Napoleon must work with Hamster and Bot to create the love potion spell to stop Tom from eating a lovestruck Jerry. Things go awry as his potions create a range of emotions from all the lab residents.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Turn About. Butch locks Tom in the basement to keep him from attending a date with Toodles. When Butch shows up instead Toodles suprises him with babysitting her misbehaving nieces and nephews. Tom tries to escape from the basement but keeps getting blocked by Jerry and Tuffy who think it's a monster downstairs.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The Plight Before Christmas. Tom accidentally puts a spell on Santa that transforms him into a cookie. When he can't figure out how to transform him back Tom and Jerry volunteer to help Santa deliver gifts. A Christmas miracle occurs when Tom and Jerry sacrifice their own gifts for each other.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Friends. The bugs talk about what it means to be someone's friend.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Lord Bean. Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Car Wars. Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Wedding Day. Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Bean Phone. Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock. Ginger places her granny's old cuckoo clock in the hall, and it still works! However, the newly arrived clock causes issues when Tom wants to catch the tiny wooden bird inside and Tuffy wants to befriend it.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Plant Food. At midnight, a gothic lady cat appears with her favorite sinister plant creatures including her personal favorite: Fang, a big man-eating plant. As long as it's sealed in the hothouse, nothing can go wrong. But Tom, Jerry and Tuffy soon have their hands full with the escaped plant.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Whack a Gopher. Ginger and Rick's vegetable garden is growing, and they need a way to keep out the gophers. Ginger says traps are cruel, but Tom can handle the task! However, things start getting out of hand when a lady gopher falls in love with Jerry, and the two plan a garden raid together.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Hula Whoops. Tom and Jerry take a case for Toodles' cousin in Hawaii, hoping to sneak in some rest and relaxation, but it's no vacation. The cousin's missing pineapple plant is only the starting place of the investigation as Tom and Jerry track down the culprit in this tropical environment.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: A Game of Bones. After Tyke digs up, Hammy, Spike's lucky bone, Spike reburies it right away because it's bad luck to remove it. Soon afterward, Tom gets a set of toy dog bones that do tricks, and he teases Spike and Tyke with them. When the whirly-bone buries itself and unearths Hammy for a second time, Spike recruits the other animals to help prevent the bad luck he expects.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Bull Fight. Tom and Jerry take a case from a mother tortoise to find out where her son Seymour is sneaking off to at night. They discover Seymour is self-training to win a championship boxing match, planning to pay off bills with the prize money so his mom can quit the car wash. When he offers Tom and Jerry a cut of the money to keep his secret, they take it and agree to train him—but it won't be easy.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Opera Bean. Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Taxi Bean. Mr Bean takes a taxi to his local toyshop but a dodgy cabbie thinks he can take Mr Bean for a ride. After a mix up Mr Bean finds himself driving the taxi and starts to have fun couriering people to their destinations even giving an American tourist an extensive tour of London. But will the taxi driver find out what’s been going on and how much will Bean’s final fare be?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Muscle Bean. Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A New Friend. Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Crystal Cavern
programme.desc: Crystal Cavern

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: A Joker for a Queen. Jojo, one of the King of Frostaland’s joker cards, looks on in awe as Queen skillfully guides her procession of cards with a snap of her fingers! When the King responds with his own parade, however, he lets his cards do whatever they please, leaving poor Jojo clueless. This prompts her to decide to leave Frostaland and head off to train in Wonderland, to be part of the Queen’s parade. Noticing how sad the King is to see his joker card go, Alice and Lewis do everything they can to persuade Jojo to return. But in so doing, they too find themselves enrolled alongside the Queen’s cards!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Double Teatime in Wonderland. Jealous of the King of Frostaland, who is celebrating Alice’s “non-birthday,” the Queen organizes a double-teatime at the castle and forces all her subjects to attend. Alice and Lewis try to enjoy both celebrations. But there’s no denying it: it’s way more chill at the King’s party than the Queen’s, where the poor guests are subjected to fear and intimidation! In fact, it’s so bad that before long, the Queen’s guests start defecting, migrating to the more fun venue in Frostaland. Alice and Lewis try to avoid a crisis by making sure the Queen doesn’t find out they’re having fun behind her back…

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Dodson's Predictions. In order to escape punishment, Dodson kids the Queen into believing he is able to read the future. Falling for his story, Queen names him “Great Fortune-Telling Dodo” and invites him to live in the castle. Dodson milks it, using his influence over the monarch to fulfill all his desires, even if it means relieving poor Lewis of his clockmaster duties! Luckily, Alice runs to her rabbit friend’s rescue. But how are they going to prove to the Queen that Dodson doesn’t actually have a single power and that he’s merely using her for his own benefit?!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The "Werewolf Cactus". Lewis gets a shock when he wakes up one morning and sees all his carrots have been gobbled up overnight! To get to the bottom of it, Alice and Lewis call on the Police Card. Our two heroes accuse Dodson right off the bat: he seems to be the perfect suspect! But then discover the true culprit: a cactus that transforms into a “werewolf cactus” when night falls! And Alice and Lewis are in for a big surprise when they find out who is behind this famished creature!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Who's The Boss. Tom walks in and catches Mercury trying to break into in the garage. He thinks Mercury would make the cool, exciting pet he's always wanted. To Mike's horror, Tom makes him promise to make sure nothing happens to Mercury while he's at school. Mike, ever the obedient pooch, does his best but the turtles want Mercury out of the house. Mercury is making himself way too comfortable. Mike will need to use all his brainpower to kick the unwanted guest out of the house and enlists Freddy as an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Trojan Racoons. The raccoons find a brilliant way of getting into the Mikkelsen's house without anyone noticing by getting mailed to the house inside in a cardboard box. Mike falls for it and the raccoons are free to steal whatever they want in their few minutes of freedom inside the house. The racoons skedaddle back to their lair, but instead of stealing the loot, Mercury brings back an old grandfather clock that belonged to the family's grandmother. Now Mike has to break into the raccoon's lair, retrieve the family heirloom and give the raccoons a taste of their own medicine.
